name: crawler
content:
crawler noun [C]
(MOVING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK a baby who has not yet learned to walk
ChrisHepburn/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
something, such as a vehicle, that moves very slowly

crawler noun [C]
(TRYING TO PLEASE)
UK informal disapproving a person who tries hard to please others in order to get an advantage

crawler noun [C]
(INTERNET)
internet & telecoms
  specialized (also web crawler) a computer program that automatically searches for information on the internet, usually in order to index (= list) internet content

crawler noun [C]
(VEHICLE)
a vehicle, for example a crane or tractor, that moves on a track (= a belt of flat plates around a set of wheels) or tracks
bjdlzx/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
